article:
Mr.Smith is our English teacher.He is about 1.76 meters _ .He has black hair and two big _ . He works very hard in the school. Every student likes him very much.He gets up early in the morning.Every day he walks to the _ . Then he asks all his students to _ in the classroom. At eight o'clock school _ .Mr.Smith has two classes in the morning and in the other time he checks the _ homework. In the afternoon he prepares his _ lessons. He is very careful,so his classes are usually interesting. _ school he plays basketball on the playground. In the evening,he sometimes helps some of his students _ English at home.And sometimes he writes something useful. He likes writing. We often read _ he writes in the newspaper.
This is our teacher,a good and kind person.We love him for ever.
